item.title: CSS Typography
item.description: Typography This is an example: h1 { font-size: 3rem; }

item.title: CSS Selectors
item.description: Element selector: h1 { font-size: 4rem; } ID selector: #main { color: red; } Class selector: .nav { background-color: blue; } Compound selectors Match all h1 elements with a class of front-page h1.front-page { letter-spacing: 0.05rem; } Match all h1 elements with a class of both front-page and head-line h1.front-page.head-line { line-spacing: 1rem; } Descendant combinator The space makes it a descendant combinator. This matched all right-side elements that are direct or indirect descandent of the left-side.
